org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.fieldbuilder

Class NullableCustomField<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.flow.component.Component
      • com.vaadin.flow.component.AbstractField<CustomField<T>,T>
        • com.vaadin.flow.component.customfield.CustomField<T>
          • org.dellroad.stuff.vaadin22.fieldbuilder.NullableCustomField<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AttachNotifier, BlurNotifier<CustomField>, DetachNotifier, Focusable<CustomField>, FocusNotifier<CustomField>, HasElement, HasEnabled, HasHelper, HasSize, HasValidation, HasValue<AbstractField.ComponentValueChangeEvent<CustomField<T>,T>,T>, HasValueAndElement<AbstractField.ComponentValueChangeEvent<CustomField<T>,T>,T>, Serializable, HasInternalValidator<AbstractField.ComponentValueChangeEvent<CustomField<T>,T>,T>

    public class NullableCustomField<T>
extends CustomField<T>
implements HasInternalValidator<AbstractField.ComponentValueChangeEvent<CustomField<T>,T>,T>
    A CustomField that wraps an inner field and sticks an enablement checkbox in front of it which explicitly controls whether the value is null or not.

    When the checkbox is checked, the inner field functions normally. When the checkbox is unchecked, the inner field is completely disabled and the value of this field is null.

    Implements HasInternalValidator, delegating to the inner field (for non-null values only) if it also implements HasInternalValidator.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • buildLayout

        protected void buildLayout()
        Build the layout for this field.

        The implementation in NullableCustomField adds a HorizontalLayout containing the checkbox and the inner field.

      • setNullified

        protected void setNullified(boolean nullified)
        Set whether the field is nullified or not.

        The implementation in NullableCustomField updates the checkbox and enables/disabled the component accordingly (assuming it implements HasEnabled).

        Parameters:
        nullified - if field should be null and the nested components disabled
